abstract: Unbound collection of texts on occult sciences, in different hands and on papers from various provenance and format. See individual records for more details.
contents: 7. Item 7 : Hādhā Kitāb al-Shiʻrah al-Yamānīyah wa-Malḥamat Dāniyāl / al-Ḥakīm Hirmis.
title: [Collection of texts on occult sciences].
subject: Divination—Religious aspects—Islam—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
